original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.6. Nahetusahetukaduka
analyzed: na hetu sa hetuka duka

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ekaṁ
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…. Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
analyzed: mahābhūtam paṭicca tayaḥ mahābhūtā pe na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu

original: naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca nahetusahetukā
analyzed: na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vatthum paṭicca na hetu sa hetukā

original: khandhā. Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko ca nahetu naahetuko
analyzed: khandhāḥ na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ ca na hetu na ahetukaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko ca nahetu naahetuko ca dhammā
analyzed: na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sahetukaḥ ca na hetu na ahetukaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ nasahetukañca nahetuṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo
analyzed: na hetum na sa hetukam ca na hetum na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasahetukañca nahetuṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sahetukam ca na hetum na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasahetukañca nahetuṁ naahetukañca
analyzed: na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sahetukam ca na hetum na ahetukam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko ca nahetu naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sahetuko ca na hetu na ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Ārammaṇa
analyzed: ārammaṇa

original: Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu nasahetuko dhammo nahetussa naahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa hetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu naahetuko dhammo nahetussa naahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu naahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye
analyzed: ārammaṇe cattāri pe anantare cattāri pe sahajāte satta aññamaññe cha nissaye

original: satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme …pe… jhāne cattāri,
analyzed: satta upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve kamme pe jhāne cattāri

original: magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta.
analyzed: magge tīṇi sampayutte dve vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate satta

original: Hetugocchakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: hetu gocchakam niṭṭhita
